reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 279/15: ACCIDENT AND SICKNESS INSURANCE - APPLICATION OF PART VII OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: ACCIDENT AND SICKNESS INSURANCE - APPLICATION OF PART VII OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Insurance Act   Loi sur les assurances

content.content:
1. In this Regulation, “2012 amendments” means Schedule 23 to the
Strong Action for Ontario Act (Budget Measures), 2012; “2013 amendments” means Schedule 8 to the Prosperous and Fair Ontario Act (Budget Measures), 2013.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“2012 amendments” means Schedule 23 to the Strong Action for Ontario Act (Budget Measures), 2012;

“2013 amendments” means Schedule 8 to the Prosperous and Fair Ontario Act (Budget Measures), 2013.

content.content: 2. (1) Section 293 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day section 36 of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to contracts made on or after that day. (2) For contracts that were made before the day referred to in subsection (1), section 293 of the Act as it read immediately before that day continues to apply.
content.raw_html:
2. (1) Section 293 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day section 36 of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to contracts made on or after that day.

(2) For contracts that were made before the day referred to in subsection (1), section 293 of the Act as it read immediately before that day continues to apply.

content.content: 3. (1) Paragraph 6 of subsection 294 (2) of the Act, as it reads on and after the day subsection 37 (2) of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to policies issued on or after that day. (2) Subsection 294 (3) of the Act, as it reads on and after the day subsection 37 (3) of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to policies issued on or after that day.
content.raw_html:
3. (1) Paragraph 6 of subsection 294 (2) of the Act, as it reads on and after the day subsection 37 (2) of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to policies issued on or after that day.

(2) Subsection 294 (3) of the Act, as it reads on and after the day subsection 37 (3) of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to policies issued on or after that day.

content.content: 4. (1) Section 296 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day subsection 39 (1) of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only with respect to policies issued on or after that day. (2) For policies of group insurance that were issued before the day referred to in subsection (1), section 296 of the Act as it read immediately before that day continues to apply. (3) Paragraphs 6 to 8 of section 296 of the Act, as they read on and after the day subsection 39 (2) of the 2012 amendments comes into force, apply only with respect to policies issued on or after that day.
content.raw_html:
4. (1) Section 296 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day subsection 39 (1) of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only with respect to policies issued on or after that day.

(2) For policies of group insurance that were issued before the day referred to in subsection (1), section 296 of the Act as it read immediately before that day continues to apply.

(3) Paragraphs 6 to 8 of section 296 of the Act, as they read on and after the day subsection 39 (2) of the 2012 amendments comes into force, apply only with respect to policies issued on or after that day.

content.content: 5. (1) Section 297 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day section 40 of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only with respect to the termination of a contract or benefit provision that occurs on or after that day. (2) If the contract or benefit provision was terminated before the day referred to in subsection (1), section 297 of the Act as it read immediately before that day continues to apply with respect to the termination.
content.raw_html:
5. (1) Section 297 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day section 40 of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only with respect to the termination of a contract or benefit provision that occurs on or after that day.

(2) If the contract or benefit provision was terminated before the day referred to in subsection (1), section 297 of the Act as it read immediately before that day continues to apply with respect to the termination.

content.content: 6. (1) Subsection 298 (1) of the Act, as it reads on and after the day subsection 41 (1) of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to certificates and other documents issued on or after that day. (2) For certificates and other documents that were issued before the day referred to in subsection (1), subsection 298 (1) of the Act as it read immediately before that day, continues to apply. (3) Paragraphs 4 to 7 of subsection 298 (1) of the Act, as they read on and after the day subsection 41 (3) of the 2012 amendments comes into force, apply only to certificates and other documents issued on or after that day.
content.raw_html:
6. (1) Subsection 298 (1) of the Act, as it reads on and after the day subsection 41 (1) of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to certificates and other documents issued on or after that day.

(2) For certificates and other documents that were issued before the day referred to in subsection (1), subsection 298 (1) of the Act as it read immediately before that day, continues to apply.

(3) Paragraphs 4 to 7 of subsection 298 (1) of the Act, as they read on and after the day subsection 41 (3) of the 2012 amendments comes into force, apply only to certificates and other documents issued on or after that day.

content.content: 7. (1) Section 300 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day subsection 42 (1) of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to contracts made on or after that day. (2) For contracts that were made before the day referred to in subsection (1), section 300 of the Act as it read immediately before that day continues to apply.
content.raw_html:
7. (1) Section 300 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day subsection 42 (1) of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to contracts made on or after that day.

(2) For contracts that were made before the day referred to in subsection (1), section 300 of the Act as it read immediately before that day continues to apply.

content.content: 8. (1) Section 302 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day section 43 of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to contracts made on or after that day. (2) For contracts that were made before the day referred to in subsection (1), section 302 of the Act as it read immediately before that day continues to apply.
content.raw_html:
8. (1) Section 302 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day section 43 of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to contracts made on or after that day.

(2) For contracts that were made before the day referred to in subsection (1), section 302 of the Act as it read immediately before that day continues to apply.

content.content: 9. (1) Section 305 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day section 47 of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to policies issued on or after that day. (2) For policies that were issued before the day referred to in subsection (1), section 305 of the Act as it read immediately before that day continues to apply.
content.raw_html:
9. (1) Section 305 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day section 47 of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to policies issued on or after that day.

(2) For policies that were issued before the day referred to in subsection (1), section 305 of the Act as it read immediately before that day continues to apply.

content.content: 10. (1) Subsections 308 (2) and (3) of the Act, as they read on and after the day section 24 of the 2013 amendments comes into force, apply only to applications made on or after that day. (2) Subsections 308 (2) and (3) of the Act, as they read immediately before the day section 24 of the 2013 amendments come into force, continue to apply to applications made before that day.
content.raw_html:
10. (1) Subsections 308 (2) and (3) of the Act, as they read on and after the day section 24 of the 2013 amendments comes into force, apply only to applications made on or after that day.

(2) Subsections 308 (2) and (3) of the Act, as they read immediately before the day section 24 of the 2013 amendments come into force, continue to apply to applications made before that day.

content.content: 11. (1) Section 309 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day section 50 of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to applications made on or after that day. (2) For applications that were made before the day referred to in subsection (1), section 309 of the Act as it read immediately before that day continues to apply.
content.raw_html:
11. (1) Section 309 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day section 50 of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to applications made on or after that day.

(2) For applications that were made before the day referred to in subsection (1), section 309 of the Act as it read immediately before that day continues to apply.

content.content: 12. Section 311 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day section 51 of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to certificates issued with respect to a debtor insured on or after that day.
content.raw_html: 12. Section 311 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day section 51 of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to certificates issued with respect to a debtor insured on or after that day.

content.content: 13. Section 318.1 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day section 61 of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to claims arising on or after the day that is two years before the day section 61 of the 2012 amendments comes into force.
content.raw_html: 13. Section 318.1 of the Act, as it reads on and after the day section 61 of the 2012 amendments comes into force, applies only to claims arising on or after the day that is two years before the day section 61 of the 2012 amendments comes into force.

content.content: 14. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 14. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
